div.p: Time-dependent relative luminescence intensity changes in duct cells. Intracellular luminescence intensity changes of regions of interest were recorded during a period of 2 h for cells in physiological saline alone (grey line) and separately for cells incubated in physiological saline with 5 nM QD655 (black line) or 10 nM lipodots using one of the two different lipid compositions (red & blue lines). Intensity changes relative to the starting point ( t = 0) were analysed from 2P-FLIM images recorded in the green detection channel; means ± SEM of N = 3–18.
